races.name: Human
races.description: Versatile and ambitious, humans are the most adaptable of races.

races.name: Elf
races.description: Graceful and long-lived, elves are attuned to magic and nature.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Hardy and resilient, dwarves are known for their craftsmanship and endurance.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: Small but brave, halflings are known for their luck and courage.

races.name: Dragonborn
races.description: Proud and powerful, dragonborn are descended from dragons.

races.name: Gnome
races.description: Curious and inventive, gnomes are masters of illusion and tinkering.

races.name: Half-Elf
races.description: Combining human versatility with elven grace.

races.name: Half-Orc
races.description: Strong and fierce, half-orcs combine human ambition with orcish might.

races.name: Tiefling
races.description: Descended from fiends, tieflings bear infernal heritage.
